body_html: @ebrevdo I merge your bugfix code for state dropout, please let me know if I break anything. My main idea is if training is marked False, then all dropout intention should be suppressed, so I just move those bugfix lines into the state dropout sub function. Thanks.

body: @ebrevdo I merge your bugfix code for state dropout, please let me know if I break anything. My main idea is if `training` is marked `False`, then all dropout intention should be suppressed, so I just move those bugfix lines into the state dropout sub function. Thanks.
